text: Find me, Lyonya! () is a 1971 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolay Lebedev.«В моей смерти прошу винить Клаву К.»: реальная история первой любвиНАЙДИ МЕНЯ, ЛЁНЯ! (1971) It stars Anna Aleksakhina, Larisa Baranova, and Viktor Chekmaryov. == Actors == * Anna Aleksakhina as Myshka * Larisa Baranova as Dinka * Viktor Chekmaryov * Aleksandr Demyanenko * Sergey Dvoretskiy as Kostya's pal == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1971 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolay Lebedev Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Find me, Lyonya!
